subject: Mental Health
title: The Psychedelic Renaissance
description: A 60-second lesson on The Psychedelic Renaissance.

hook.text: LSD was once a promising psychiatric drug. Then the war on drugs shut it all down.

buildup.text: In the 1950s, researchers found psychedelics helped alcoholism and end-of-life anxiety.

discovery.text: After decades of prohibition, clinical trials have resumed with stunning results.

twist.text: Psilocybin shows breakthrough results for treatment-resistant depression in trials.

climax.text: The FDA granted breakthrough therapy status to psilocybin in 2018 and 2019.

punchline.text: What was banned may become the next breakthrough.

quiz.question: What status did the FDA grant psilocybin therapy?
